resource.item: One of the elementary space resources. Combine with Endurium to create Prometid.
One of the elementary space resources. Combine with either Prometium to create Prometid or Terbium to create Duranium.
One of the elementary space resources. Combine with Endurium to create Duranium.
Required to create Promerium on your ship and in the Skylab
Created from 10 Prometid and 10 Duranium, Requires: Xenomit
Created with Promerium and a Xeno Module in Skylab and with Schism and Scrap in the Assembly.
Palladium can be collected on the Maps 5-1 and 5-3. On Map 5-2 it can be exchanged with Galaxy Gate Energy.
Log-disks can be exchanged for Research Points.
The L-D Log Disc is mainly available from Booty Boxes and Galaxy Gates.
Used to open pirate booty and collect the valuable treasure contained within.
Required to open valuable green pirate chests and collect priceless treasures.
Required to open valuable red pirate chests and collect priceless treasures.
Required to open valuable blue pirate chests and collect priceless treasures.
Required to open any valuable silver Pirate Booty and collect fabulous treasures.
Grab Apocalypse Booty Keys to unlock the treasure trove of great items which have been placed in the Apocalypse Box.
Retrieved from the depths of space this fragment is part of the Prometheus Space Station. A striking symbol of the tenacity of humanity, it can be used to unlock a Pramantha Chest.
Where did the Obsidian Microchips originate? Who knows, but this valuable commodity opens Obsidian Booty Boxes, filled with essential items for any pilot.
Piece of the Apis pirate drone blueprint
A piece of the Zeus pirate drone blueprints.
This Jump Voucher will let you jump away for free to any known map, or you can use it for a free ship warp!
Use this to make free emergency repairs to your drones, or for a sojourn at a repair station for your ship.
Used to build Galaxy Gates. Open the way to the far corners of the universe!
Your P.E.T. only runs when it's got fuel.
You are already using this design.

All your ships sold off or in hock? Don't worry - your Company won't leave you in the lurch! This free beater will let you rise like a phoenix from the ashes of your gambling problem and/or lack of foresight, and will ferry you around until you can afford something better.

Updated, tweaked, and fully upgraded, the classic Yamato is back in business. You can strut your stuff in her, too - you'll find a [travel mode capacity] under her hood, which will give you a temporary speed boost.

The Leonov is worth every scrap of Uridium asked for her. Versatile, agile, and with an unbeatable home advantage: more cargo space and more speed when you're in your Company's sectors! Your Company has your back - and now, you can return the favor!

An old-timer spaceship with vintage style! The Defcom is currently enjoying an impressive revival, and its newest iteration features a cloaking device hidden behind those gorgeous hot-rod lines. No classic ship collection is complete without her!

You never forget your first...! No matter whose logo you display, the Liberator is the proven workhorse that shuttled you safely through your first dogfights. This nostalgic little trip down Memory Lane rounds out any collection.

This ship is a fitting reward for the insanely tough training that Elite pilots survive. Like her namesake, she's a fast, agile hunter with sharp teeth - only pilots who have proven their worth in the heat of battle can control her!

The Nostromo is one of the best ships that Credits can buy. You can even arm her with successively more powerful modifying designs thanks to Lunar Industries' innovative "Invite-a-Friend" bonus program! Easy as pie.
The best Star Hunter: you'll have (almost) nothing to fear in this ship!

No fleet worth its salt would dream of trying to do without this ship! It may not be the fastest thing in orbit, but it boasts the most cargo space of any ship available for Credits. That's true utility!
The ultimate battlecruiser: hot-shot pilots accept no substitutes!

A Citadel is often affectionately called a "Clank Tank" - or just The Tank - by her crew. She's a hulking Heavy Cruiser with two rocket launcher slots and various abilities that make her a mobile shield for her allies. Now this bulwark among spaceships can be yours!

The Aegis tips the scales one way or the other in every battle she's flown in. This versatile engineering ship's support and repair abilities have often made the difference between defeat and victory - so make sure she's on your side!

An agile reconnaissance ship, ideal for the ruthless, cold-blooded lone wolf. Spearheads can penetrate unseen deep into enemy territory as scouts, disable enemy ships' skills, or even mark them for her allies.
Customize your Bigboy with this refined design, and enjoy your new look!
Customize your Goliath with this refined design, and enjoy your timeless new look!
Customize your Goliath with this refined design, and enjoy your hot new look!
Customize your Goliath with this true blue design, and enjoy your new look!
Customize your Goliath with this refined design, and enjoy your cool new look!
Customize your Nostromo with this refined design, and enjoy your new look!
Customize your Goliath with this refined design, and enjoy your sharp new look!
All hail the medalist! To commemorate your gold medal in the Ultimate Battle Arena, you've earned the right to sport this champion of a design.
Well done! To commemorate your silver medal in the Ultimate Battle Arena, you've earned the right to sport this winner of a design.
Well done! To commemorate your bronze medal in the Ultimate Battle Arena, you've earned the right to sport this serious contender of a design.
The excitement and danger of the Ultimate Battle Arena are worth commemorating - and now, with the Iron Goliath, you can fly your souvenir!
Goliath on the rocks, coming right up - here's a drink that's a little too strong for your foes! The Absolute Zero is certain to give rival pilots cold feet and goosebumps.

Loyal, trustworthy, tough - no pilot could wish for a better support system! This ship has the following abilities: 5% extra damage, 50% longer-lasting repairbots, 20% faster shield repair, and 10% faster HP repair.

Be the shield your allies deserve: the A-Veteran is a beautifully designed support ship, ready to prove her worth in any battle! This ship has the following abilities: 5% bonus to experience and honor points.
As the hare and the turtle taught us, speed does not always mean victory! The powerful BB-Solemn proves the truth of that fable. This ship has the following abilities: 10% bonus to experience.

This flying fortress will teach your enemies the true meaning of fear! This ship has the following abilities: 5% extra damage, 50% increased durations of the Protection and Draw Fire abilities, 25% shorter Fortify ability, and 15% shorter Travel ability.
The uncompromising battlecruiser in which to gain the respect of your allies and sow discord among your enemies! This ship has the following abilities: 5% bonus to experience and honor points.

The battlecruiser of choice for cunning pilots: first, weaken enemy shields, then let loose with a vicious salvo. This ship has the following abilities: 5% extra damage, and the Weaken Shields ability.

This battlecruiser makes itself indispensable in any battle, big or small. Even the fiercest alien threats won't find you to be easy game when you go up against them in your Bastion. This ship has the following abilities: 10% extra shield power.

Shield your fragile human body from the dangers of space - aliens, cold, vacuum, and enemy pilots, among others - with the Centaur, an extra layer of the finest protection the Goliath class can offer. This ship has the following abilities: 10% bonus to HP.

This battlecruiser is the perfect canvas for you! Decorate it with Flag designs from around the globe that you've won from various events. This ship has the following abilities: 5% extra damage, and 10% bonus to honor points.

No clan can afford not to have this massive ship within its fleet! The brute force of the G-Enforcer sets a new bar for deep-space warfare, and will be the backbone of any raiding party. This ship has the following abilities: 5% extra damage.

Red as heart's blood, this battlecruiser may well have been assembled by the devil's own shipwright. This is no vessel for a shy pilot! This ship has the following abilities: 10% bonus to honor points.

There's the shot, and -- goooooal! If football is your life, this is the battlecruiser for you. Bring the excitement of the stadium to deep space! This ship has the following abilities: 10% bonus to experience.
A rare gem matching the design of the ships, which fought and won the second Sibelon War of 2727. Relive past glories, fly the flag of humanity and ride into battle with this paragon of mankind!>
Show your love of the beautiful game - and of fast ships and exciting dogfights! - with the G-Kick. This ship has the following abilities: 10% extra shield power.

The Goliath Peacemaker was developed after the signing of the Crystal Truce in 2641. One of three ships, created by the three different factions to provide a new sense of unity between the companies. The ship gives a 5% bonus to Influence earned, and 7% extra damage against pilots from rival Factions!
The Goliath Referee was developed to celebrate the human games of the past and future. Radiating authority and remaining impartial the ship also gives 5% extra damage.

Available from the Kronos Gate! In the depths of Kronos, many a treasure awaits. Anyone piloting this battlecruiser is trumpeting their skill and courage in mastering the Kronos Gate! This ship has the following abilities: 20% more HP.

The Goliath Sovereign was developed after the signing of the Crystal Truce in 2641. One of three ships, created by the three different factions to provide a new sense of unity between the companies. The ship gives a 5% bonus to Influence earned, and 7% extra damage against pilots from rival Factions!

As precise and potentially deadly as a scalpel! Equip yourself with the very latest innovation to come out of our R&D department. This ship has the following abilities: 6% extra damage, 6% more honor points earned, 6% more XP earned, and an additional Generator Slot.
Lend a touch of immortality to your Goliath Surgeon with this cutting edge design inspired by the mythical cicadas!

The Goliath Vanquisher was developed after the signing of the Crystal Truce in 2641. One of three ships, created by the three different factions to provide a new sense of unity between the companies. The ship gives a 5% bonus to Influence earned, and 7% extra damage against pilots from rival Factions!
Sleek, glossy, and with every detail crafted to the highest standard, this combat vessel is as luxurious and precious as ivory! This ship has the following abilities: 10% bonus to experience.

Be the VIP of your faction with the Nostromo Ambassador. The ship that helped seal the Crystal Truce of 2641 is now yours. Ready to add a touch of class, diplomacy and still be a powerful vessel in battle. Be proud to be one to own it!

Available from friend invites and special events! Does deep space exploration mean more to you than the application of brute force? Invite enough friends to join you in orbit and the N-Diplomat could soon be your most loyal assistant on expeditions into unknown sectors!

Available from friend invites and special events! Politics, boring? Not with the N-Envoy! Invite enough friends to join you in orbit and you can all become harbingers of humanity, delivering pointed warnings as to why we're dangerous to cross!

Developed by the brilliant minds on Yeni'turkiye Station, the Pusat Vengeance design features a rich arsenal of lasers and generators for delicious, hard-hitting firepower, at the expense of armour. Strike hard and fast when you're at its helm.

Do you want a Recon Ship that will meet your exacting standards? The Spearhead Elite is as menacing as it is effective. This ship has the following abilities: 5% extra damage, 50% increased durations of the Ultimate Cloak and Recon abilities, 25% shorter Target Marker ability, and 15% longer cooldown of the JAMX ability.
A sophisticated Recon Ship for refined pilots. Your enemies won't see you until it's too late! This ship has the following abilities: 5% bonus to experience and honor points.

The Sentinel awes with its futuristic design and robust shields. Fly wing-to-wing with other Sentinels to create an impenetrable shield wall! This ship has the following abilities: 10% extra shield power, and the Fortress ability, which massively increases your shielding for a brief time.

In space, no-one can hear you scream... but you can come to the rescue! In the Solace, you're an oasis and beacon for your allies in a dark, hostile desert. This ship has the following abilities: 10% extra shield power, and the Nano-Cluster Repairer ability, which immediately repairs the hulls of your ship and your group members' ships!
Turn into a protective firewall for your allies by coating your sturdy Solace with this fiery design!

The Spectrum is a kaleidoscope of color to blind your foes. Laser beams roll off of this polished battlecruiser's hull like water off a duck's back! This ship has the following abilities: 10% extra shield power, and the Prismatic Shielding ability, which will render enemy laser attacks almost useless, though it also temporarily weakens your own lasers.

Clothes make the man - and the same holds true for the ship and the pilot! A valuable vessel that's just the ticket for any pilot worth their salt, this ship has the following abilities: 10% bonus to experience.
The Avenger is a starfighter that's the complete package, making you a tough nut to crack for enemy pilots and fearsome aliens alike! This ship has the following abilities: 10% extra shield power.
Honor to whom honor is due: the cool V-Corsair is the starfighter of choice for intergalactic exploits of all kinds! This ship has the following abilities: 10% bonus to honor points.

Strike out of a clear blue sky - or the deep black cold of space - and give your enemies an electrifying reception in the Lightning! This ship has the following abilities: 5% extra damage, and the Afterburner ability, which will boost your ship's speed by 30% for 5 seconds!

The V-Revenge is best used to deliver the coup de grace that ends a fierce battle, with K.O. power ideal for dealing with dangerous aliens and enemy Clans alike. This ship has the following abilities: 5% extra damage.

A leviathan amongst battlecruisers! Sting your foes with its deadly poison and then step back and let the venom do the rest! This ship has the following abilities: 5% extra damage, and the Singularity ability, which will paralyze enemy ships and cause them substantial damage over time!
The Venom has never seemed so resplendent than is does in the powerful and trubulent colours of the ocean. Remember the Pacific at its best. Get the Ocean Venom Design!
Bring the turbulent ocean with you. Your enemies will never forget you when you rain laser fire upon them coated in the Ocean Solace Design. Unleash the tsunami!
Fill them with fear as you descend upon your enemy encased in the Locust G-Surgeon Design. Time to operate and make a final incision into your foe, in dramatic style!
Combine the unique capabilities of the Aegis Elite with the cool of an icy design and give your opponents chills!
As hard as an iceberg, and just as dangerous to passing ships! The Glacier combines the strength of an ice fortress with the uncompromising solidity of a Citadel Elite.
You have the heart of a champion! Show off your pride in humanity's exciting past, and deck your Goliath out in a brilliant design inspired by our ancestors - home of the brave, indeed!
Your N-Ambassador looks even better with an icy veneer. Deep freeze any resistance!
When the Pusat's icy design bears down on your enemies, it's too late for them to flee. The combined firepower of her arsenal of lasers and generators will roll over them like a mountain avalanche!

The frosty aesthetics of the Icicle will send a delightful shiver down the spine of any discriminating pilot - she's a triumph of arctic aesthetics, combined with the capabilities of a Spearhead Elite.
She'll haunt the black infinity of space like a freezing mist, making enemy pilots' hair stand on end - despite their helmets!
Fly the full spectrum of cool! Even the hottest of lasers will be countered by her icy shielding, keeping you toasty and safe.
Thunder across the galaxy from the cockpit of this arctic design, which combines sheer storm power with lightning speed!
Freeze the blood in your enemies' veins! When you cloak it in this frosty cool design, your Venom will be as slippery as fresh-brewed poison poured onto ice.
This Venom design captivates with its toxic mixture of fire and venom. Highly dangerous!

When your opponents look for long enough into the abyss, you'll come screaming out of it with lasers to their face! The Tartarus merits its gloomy name. Equip it with the Chimera P.E.T. and Phantom drones for the full matched set, and this high-tech M.A.S.Q.U.E.-designed battlecruiser will be the terror of deep space. This ship has the following abilities:

The Mimesis is one of the first Hawk Stealth Fighters to come off the production line. Sleek and cunning, the ship boasts two skills, a Scrambler, to disrupt other ships weapons and a Phase ability, allowing you to use a random limited jump from your location. This ship also has the following abilities: 10% extra shield power and 5% extra shield penetration.

The Ship Expo is well worth the price of admission - M.A.S.Q.U.E. knew the kinds of crowd-pleasers that sell well, and was proud to present this rare design for the Tartarus, as cool and clear as a chill winter night with the Northern Lights playing overhead.

The Ship Expo is well worth the price of admission - M.A.S.Q.U.E. knew the kinds of crowd-pleasers that sell well, and was proud to present this rare design for the Tartarus, as hot and deadly as the crest of a sandstorm.

The Borealis Mimesis Design gives your Mimesis a fine fresh feel as you take her into combat. Whilst your enemies are dazzled by the bright design you can unleash the full power of the vessels armoury upon them.
What can be hotter than the Blaze Mimesis Design! With the fiery colour of a red sun, your ready to show your true colors as you enter combat with the enemy!

What would a ship exhibition have been without an update of a classic? M.A.S.Q.U.E. spared no expense to bring this vintage beauty up to modern standards, proudly presenting this sleek new design for the Yamato!

What would a ship exhibition have been without an update of a classic? M.A.S.Q.U.E. spared no expense to bring this vintage beauty up to modern standards, proudly presenting this snazzy new design for the Defcom!

What would a ship exhibition have been without an update of a classic? M.A.S.Q.U.E. spared no expense to bring this vintage beauty up to modern standards, proudly presenting this tough new design for the Sentinel!

WWhat would a ship exhibition have been without an update of a classic? M.A.S.Q.U.E. spared no expense to bring this vintage beauty up to modern standards, proudly presenting this foxy new design for the Diminisher!

WWhat would a ship exhibition have been without an update of a classic? M.A.S.Q.U.E. spared no expense to bring this vintage beauty up to modern standards, proudly presenting this uncompromising new design for the Pusat!

What would a ship exhibition have been without an update of a classic? M.A.S.Q.U.E. spared no expense to bring this vintage beauty up to modern standards, proudly presenting this shocking new design for the Vengeance Lightning!
It's said that the radiance of this design for the Aegis Elite comes from the specially-added Devolarium hair, but it could just be marketing hogwash!
Grab your sunglasses, and slap on the high protection sunblock, because this sunny design for the Aegis Elite will get right under your skin!
With this design applied, your Aegis Elite will roll through space like a hot stream of lava, and even melt any icy comets in her way!
The Ocean design for the Aegis Elite combines both the terror and beauty of the deep sea like nothing else can!
Are you looking for a beautiful sight? With this design, the Aegis Elite will turn into stunning sparks against the dark backdrop of space.
Gleaming like gold, and as legendary as the quest for the philosopher's stone, this design for the Aegis Elite is a true sight to behold!
You have the heart of a champion! Show off your pride in humanity's exciting past, and deck your Goliath out in a brilliant design inspired by our ancestors! Vive la France!
You have the heart of a champion! Show off your pride in humanity's exciting past, and deck your Goliath out in a brilliant design inspired by our ancestors: all in one!
You have the heart of a champion! Show off your pride in humanity's exciting past, and deck your Goliath out in a brilliant design inspired by our ancestors - you, Albania, give me honor.
You have the heart of a champion! Show off your pride in humanity's exciting past, and deck your Goliath out in a brilliant design inspired by our ancestors! One for all, and all for one!
Truth prevails: you have the heart of a champion! Show off your pride in humanity's exciting past, and deck your Goliath out in a brilliant design inspired by our ancestors!
Keep calm and carry on: you have the heart of a champion! Show off your pride in humanity's exciting past, and deck your Goliath out in a brilliant design inspired by our ancestors!
You have the heart of a champion! Show off your pride in humanity's exciting past, and deck your Goliath out in a brilliant design inspired by our ancestors! Forward, Russia - no-one can catch us!
You have the heart of a champion! Show off your pride in humanity's exciting past, and deck your Goliath out in a brilliant design inspired by our ancestors. Cymru am byth!
You have the heart of a champion! Show off your pride in humanity's exciting past, and deck your Goliath out in a brilliant design inspired by our ancestors! For our freedom, and yours!
You have the heart of a champion! Sing a Londonderry Air as you show off your pride in humanity's exciting past, and deck your Goliath out in a brilliant design inspired by our ancestors!
Unity, justice, and freedom: you have the heart of a champion! Show off your pride in humanity's exciting past, and deck your Goliath out in a brilliant design inspired by our ancestors!
You have the heart of a champion! Show off your pride in humanity's exciting past, and deck your Goliath out in a brilliant design inspired by our ancestors. Glory to the heroes!
Thou ancient, thou free - thou hast the heart of a champion! Show off your pride in humanity's exciting past, and deck your Goliath out in a brilliant design inspired by our ancestors!

You have the heart of a champion! Show off your pride in humanity's exciting past, and deck your Goliath out in a brilliant design inspired by our ancestors: the chessboard will fly once more, this time in deep space!
You have the heart of a champion! Show off your pride in humanity's exciting past, and deck your Goliath out in a brilliant design inspired by our ancestors! Yaşasın Türkiye!
You have the heart of a champion! Show off your pride in humanity's exciting past, and deck your Goliath out in a brilliant design inspired by our ancestors! Viva España!
You have the heart of a champion! Show off your pride in humanity's exciting past, and deck your Goliath out in a brilliant design inspired by our ancestors! Truth prevails!
You have the heart of a champion: sworn to be free! Show off your pride in humanity's exciting past, and deck your Goliath out in a brilliant design inspired by our ancestors!
You have the heart of a champion! Show off your pride in humanity's exciting past, and deck your Goliath out in a brilliant design inspired by our ancestors! Unity grants strength!
You have the heart of a champion! Show off your pride in humanity's exciting past, and deck your Goliath out in a brilliant design inspired by our ancestors, the fratelli d'Italia!
You have the heart of a champion! Show off your pride in humanity's exciting past, and deck your Goliath out in a brilliant design inspired by our ancestors from the land of mountains, by the river!
You have the heart of a champion! Show off your pride in humanity's exciting past, and as the Himnusz plays, deck your Goliath out in a brilliant design inspired by our ancestors!
You have the heart of a champion! Show off your pride in humanity's exciting past, and deck your Goliath out in a brilliant design inspired by our ancestors! Raise your shields for Portugal!
You have the heart of a champion! Show off your pride in humanity's exciting past, play the Lofsöngur, and deck your Goliath out in a brilliant design inspired by our ancestors!
The Pusat remains as breathtaking as ever! In addition, this toxic Poison design emphasizes the Pusat's advantages.
Rumors state that real Martian dust was processed to make this classic design for the Pusat. There may be some truth to that!
Caution, hot! Make sure you have a fire extinguisher and sprinkler ready if you want to handle this hellish design for the Pusat!
Iridescent, like a thousand vipers in the darkness of deep space. This can only be the Poison design for the Spectrum!
Feel the burning hot sand of the desert beneath your feet with this design for the Spectrum. Are the heat shimmers real or just a mirage?
Magma, lava, and hellfire! This design for the Spectrum is in a class of its own. Let friends and foes alike burn with envy!
Equip this design on your Spectrum to make it flicker like fire in all colors! Who needs a rainbow when you can have dancing flames?
Glorious bonfire, glorious beacon! Nothing is superior to a blazing fire in the darkness of deep space. Turn your Pusat into a beacon of fiery courage with this design!
If it glitters, it's gold, and the amount of gold used in this legendary design for the Spectrum makes it particularly harmonious and pleasing to the eye. Beautiful, just beautiful!
Join the ranks of the greatest masters and famous pilots! Nothing flaunts your status better than this legendary design for the Pusat!
Equip this soothing design for your Spectrum, and you'll be as calm as a loose lily drifting down a golden river. Ommmmmmm!
It's time for a little bit of maritime history in space... of the rough kind! Turn your Pusat into the Flying Dutchman with this design, and become the terror of the seven universes!
Bring the bright lights of the neon city to the sharp lines of your ship with this Argon Tartarus Design. Blind them with the vibrant colour!
The fire that burns brightest burns longest. The Lava Tartarus Design will make you stand out, like a burning star, before you ignite space with your fire.
Give yourself a gold rush with the Legend Tartarus Design. Your enemies will be dazzled by the sheer bling of your look.
Come crashing down on your enemies like a wave, with the cool tones of the Ocean Tartarus Design. Let them feel the power of the ocean.
Surround your ship with the verdant glow of the Poison Tartarus Design. Be the pilot with a venomous streak.
The Borealis Goliath-X is the crisp pursuer of Goliath-X designs. The fresh feel of its markings gives a strong impression against the inky darkness of space.
The Ocean Goliath-X is the ultramarine enforcer of Goliath-X designs. The deep ocean blue of its coat hiding the riddle of Earth's seas.
The Sandstorm Goliath-X is the desert hunter of Goliath-X designs. Wrapped in the sands of the ancient deserts of Earth, it has a sense of hidden mystery.

The Goliath-X, or G-X, is the latest model of this classic fighter. The designers tweaking its appearance and technical specs to make it the best Goliath yet! Dealing an extra 2% laser damage, and earning you 2% more experience
Swoop down upon your prey in the classic Defcom Raven. The sweeping lines of the ship disguise its enhanced HP and cloaking ability. Ready to shock the enemy on arrival.
Be the lone warrior in the pack with the Yamato Ronin. The technicians have made a significant overhaul of this ships HP, making you harder to kill in conflict.
Swoop down upon your prey in the classic Defcom Raven. The sweeping lines of the ship disguise its enhanced HP and cloaking ability. Ready to shock the enemy on arrival.
Be the lone warrior in the pack with the Yamato Ronin. The technicians have made a significant overhaul of this ships HP, making you harder to kill in conflict.
A rare gem matching the design of the ships, which fought and won the second Sibelon War of 2727. Relive past glories, fly the flag of humanity and ride into battle with this paragon of mankind!

Be the VIP of your faction with the Nostromo Ambassador. The ship that helped seal the Crystal Truce of 2641 is now yours. Ready to add a touch of class, diplomacy and still be a powerful vessel in battle.
Scorch a path through the galaxy with the Inferno Ambassador Design. Making your foes face the ultimate in fiery terror!
Send your Pusat searing through space with the Inferno Pusat Design. Crafted from the energies of a dying sun.
Become the brightest ember in the firmament with the Inferno Lightning Design. A beacon to friends and a warning to your enemies.
Combustion is the key in the Inferno Sentinel Design. As an ember of a dying star was crafted into this flaming vision of beauty.
The Spectrum takes on a fine new hue, as it flares with the inferno in this Inferno Spectrum Design. Make your presence known!
Bring the glow of the pyre to your ship with the Inferno Venom Design. Crafted from the heart of a dying star, you can go blazing through the stars.

The Cyborg is engineered from the fundamental design ethics of the Goliath, combined with forms found in the insect world to give it added bite! This ship also has the following abilities: 10% extra damage.

The Hammerclaw is the first new ship in the Heavy Steel series, designed to be tough to kill with a series of skills which aid its performance in any space battle. This ship also has the following abilities: 20% bonus to HP.
In the spirit of Prometheus you can bring fire to the darkness. Setting the cosmos alight with this exceptional Lava Cyborg Design. A true beacon in the night!
When they forged this Lava Hammerclaw Design, the embers of the forge melded with its skin. Blazing a trail of victory through the stars. Be the power!
Bring the fires of the sun to the surface of your Mimesis with the Lava Mimesis Design. The true nature of your ship like burning magma!
Add more bite to your Venom with this Poison Venom Design. Strike like a rattlesnake, surprising your enemies as you enter the fray.
Bring a fresh look to your Venom with this Borealis Venom Design. Pilots marvelling at your paint job as you blast them to smithereens.
Make your Solace slide past your foes with poisonous intent when you apply this Poison Solace Design. Striking at the heart of the enemy!
When your Solace needs a new lick of paint what better color to choose than the Borealis Solace Design. Lead the field, battle hard and kill the enemy with style!
With the Argon Venom Design lighting up your Venom, you'll be a hit. A neon touch to a classic ship is all you need to make them bleed.
There's no rest for the wicked when you equip your Solace with the Argon Solace Design. As you dazzle foes with the paintwork you can blast them to kingdom come.
Live the Legend and stand out against a starry backdrop with the Legend Mimesis Design. A fresh look for your Mimesis, which will stun the enemy as you scream into battle for a golden victory!
Make them blink and take advantage when you equip your Mimesis with the Argon Mimesis Design. This stylish look shows you don’t bow down before any enemy, so show them who’s boss!
Make them sick of the sight of you as you swoop upon your enemy with this Poison Mimesis Design for your Mimesis. You’ll be the source of their misery as you strike at your enemy with your weapons!
While some see the ocean as a calming source you see it as a raging torrent, when you equip your Mimesis with this Ocean Mimesis Design. Battle like a tsunami and show them your power!
Nothing make a better warning than fire and the Lave G-Champion Design makes you looks like the burning embers of the earth. Take them with you into the inferno!
Be the most upbeat pilot in the fleet with this Argon G-Champion Design. Show them who's square when you pack their remains into boxes!

When they made the G-Champion it was always a legendary ship, but now you can give it a fresh look with the Legend G-Champion Design. Make them aware of the history of the vessel before heading into battle.
This cosmetic design for the Lava Sentinel has been forged in the volcanic lava of Jupiter's moon Io. Wrapping it in the colors of the very magma.
Show you're the best with this Argon Sentinel Cosmetic Design, giving your ship the hue of battle. Each color representing a human victory over the alien scum!
Be a true legend in your sentinel when you apply this cosmetic skin to your ship. Emblazoned in the golden coat you can ride into battle without a care in the world.
Bring the heat of battle to the heart of your Diminisher when you equip this Lava Diminisher Ship Design. Let them marvel at your style as you open the gunports and fire.
Bring in the bling with the Argon Diminisher Ship Design. With its neon tones some may think you're retro, but your weapons will prove otherwise!
Diminish the critics by showing you're a legend. Apply the Legend Diminisher skin to your ship and dazzle the enemies with your style, grace and bloodthirsty lust to win!
When you take a well-loved design like the Goliath-X and apply the energy of lava to its colours, you have a classic design and a fiery passion to succeed. Now prove it on the battlefield!
When they created the Argon Designs, the concept was to bring the feel of a nighttime city to the classic Goliath-X design. So go and prove you're ready to beat the enemies 24 hours a day!

When they mixed the legend colours with the Goliath-X model the results were so awesome, they wanted to keep the design for themselves. Lucky for you we smuggled some of them out, so you can show it off.
This crucial module is required for building a Battle Station and provides an invulnerable deflector, whilst active. Get it now!
All Clan members receive more honor points
This essential module is required for building a Battle Station, provides its hull strength, and can be used to upgrade the HP as well.
This valuable module increases the experience gained by your clan members. The best of both worlds!
Small laser: causes up to 40 damage points per round
Average laser: causes up to 60 damage points per round
Strong laser: causes up to 100 damage points per round
Much stronger laser: Causes up to 150 damage points per round
Uber laser: Causes up to 200 damage points per round.
The LF-4 is available from Booty Boxes and Galaxy Gates.

The rapid reloader!
This rocket launcher makes it possible to win a battle before it's even begun. One little rocket makes a world of difference on the battlefield - firing up to 3 rockets, this rocket launcher unleashes a broadside of destruction, giving a whole new meaning to the word firepower. This highly sophisticated piece of weaponry can only be equipped with specially designed rockets.

The rapid reloader!
This upgraded version of the Hellstorm launcher 1 makes it possible to win the battle before it's even begun. One little rocket makes a world of difference on the battlefield - firing up to 5 rockets, this rocket launcher unleashes a broadside of destruction, giving a whole new meaning to the word firepower. This highly sophisticated piece of weaponry can only be equipped with specially designed rockets.

10 jumps to X-1 home map. You may not jump from farther out than map X-4 and NOT from PvP maps (4-X). May not be used during battle.
Jump to X-1 home map, works everywhere except the pirate sector. 20 total jumps. May not be used during battle.
Automatically buys 10,000 laser rounds if less than 1,000 rounds on board. Settings can be adjusted in Equipment.
Allows you to jump to any of the valid target maps. May not be used during battle.
Automatically buys 500 rockets of the selected rocket type when you have less than 100 left on board. To set the rocket type, click on Hangar -> Equipment.

3-second protection against enemies; 10 mines and 100 Xenomit used every time

25% less chance that lasers will miss their target; 10 Xenomit used per volley

Those who fight deadly diseases must be prepared! The Serum CPU will automatically cure you of any infections or parasites.
1 dose. Automatically cures you of any infections or parasites.
With 10 doses, the Serum CPU XL is your strongest ally against parasites and infections. Cure yourself and other players - before it's too late!
10 doses. Automatically cures you or another pilot of any infections or parasites.

With the HM7 trade drone, you can sell your ore no matter what orbit you're in. Why waste time going back to the space station?
Valid for 100 transactions.
You already have an unlimited trade drone.
You already have an active trade drone. If you buy this trade drone now, you'll receive 100 more transactions.

The Saimon are legendary for their ability to transform quality scrap into shiny new goods. The Fusion Shield I provides an increased regeneration bonus of 6.25%, 3,200 shield power and absorbs 70% of enemy damage!

The Saimon are legendary for their ability to transform quality scrap into shiny new goods. The Fusion Shield II provides an increased regeneration bonus of 6.25%, 5,600 shield power and absorbs 75% of enemy damage!

The Saimon are legendary for their ability to transform quality scrap into shiny new goods. The Fusion Shield III provides an increased regeneration bonus of 6.25%, 8,000 shield power and absorbs 80% of enemy damage!

Equip your ship with Saimon tech! This Saimon Scatter Laser I can pack a punch, doing 105 damage a shot, and has an overdrive function that can cause 37.5 extra damage every 5 seconds when equipped, but the trade-off is 25% reduced range!

Equip your ship with Saimon tech! This Saimon Scatter Laser II deals an extensive hit of 120 damage and has an overdrive function that can cause 75 extra damage every 5 seconds when equipped, but the trade-off is 25% reduced range!

Equip your ship with Saimon tech! This Saimon Scatter Laser III is so strong, it will rip apart your enemy’s ships with 150 damage and has an overdrive function that can cause 150 extra damage every 5 seconds when equipped, but the trade-off is 25% reduced range!

The Spectral Lancer I was designed to slice through alien ships, cutting deep into their shields and hulls to cause 125 damage. Be warned! This laser is less effective against human ships and only does 80 damage when tackling them. Go, do some surgery!

More powerful and devastating, Spectral Lancer II brings a new meaning to the term puncture wound. Alien ships suffer 145 damage when the weapon is brought to bear but, once again, this laser is weaker against human ships, causing 90 damage. Get one before they sell out!

Not so much a laser lance as a brutal punch, the Spectral Lancer III is the pinnacle of the series. It smashes 175 damage into any alien ships, whilst still doing a respectable 130 against humans. Go for the knock-out!
The LF-4 Hyperplasmoid is a support laser, designed and built by Europa Labs. Laser Base damage: 212, Additional Boost: 0.5% HP Booster per laser.
The Magmadrill is the perfect weapon for pilots who want to challenge each other in combat. Laser Base damage: 212, Additional Boost: 5 PvP Damage(only).
Taking out the alien menace? Then you can't get better than the Paritydrill. Laser Base damage: 212, Additional Boost: 5 PvE Damage (only).

The exotic elements used to create this Unstable LF-4 mean that the damage it does varies wildly. Each shot randomly fluctuating in damage, from a minimum of 128 to a powerful maximum of 220. Providing a real shock to the enemy!
Each shot randomly fluctuating in damage, from a minimum of 128 to a powerful maximum of 220. Providing a real shock to the enemy!
Short-range rocket: causes up to 1,000 damage points per rocket fired
Mid-range rocket: causes up to 2,000 damage points per rocket fired
Long-range rocket: causes up to 4,000 points per rocket fired

Each rocket inflicts a max. of 6,000 HP of damage, but has a lower accuracy rate due to its impressive firepower.
An exceptional weapon when used in combination with the Tech Center's precision targeter.
This plasma charger causes a 40% reduction of your target's accuracy for 5 seconds.
40% reduction of target's accuracy for 5 seconds
Hit your opponent with a deceleration rocket to slow them down by %AMOUNT%% for %TIME% seconds.
Reduces target's speed by 30% for 5 seconds
Hologram-emitter rockets create a temporary hologram around a ship to alter its actual appearance.

The EMP burst releases an electromagnetic pulse wave to temporarily short-circuit your enemies' onboard instruments and disable their targeting devices. If you're really lucky, the burst will also uncloak them, allowing you to shoot them out of the sky like birds.
Breaks enemies lock on you and may reveal cloaked enemies positions

Give your foes a frosty reception! Hit your target and render it motionless for a whole two seconds. EMPs as well as the abilities "Afterburner" (Lightning ship design) and "Travel" (Citadel) can protect you against these freezing long-range rockets!
Freeze your enemies for two seconds and slow them down considerably
Make your ship ghostly for a minute!
Proximity mine: causes 100% uncloaking upon detonation
Breaks enemies lock on you and may reveal cloaked enemies positions

Proximity mine:
50% shield damage upon detonation; combinable with other mine types

Proximity mine:
20% direct damage calculated from ship's base HP and pilot-bio upgrades - powerful enough to destroy enemy ships entirely!
Slows your opponent for %TIME% seconds by %AMOUNT%%. Furthermore, it takes effect in just 1 second.
A mine that damages other players and infects them with virulent spores.
Despite their small size, these tiny firecrackers can really create an explosive display.
A superior class of fireworks with magnificent explosions to let you temporarily light up the dark galaxy.
First-rate fireworks with spectacular explosions to make others stop and stare.
Light the fuse on these special fireworks to show everyone in orbit your true colors!

Double the rockets, double the trouble!
Upon being fired from the rocket launcher, these rockets will rapidly descend upon their target and scorch it with a near apocalyptic explosion. Fired off in a broadside, they will cause even more damage, hitting an enemy ship from multiple sides to weaken its hull structure.

Your rocket launcher will fire salvos of UBR-100 rockets. Their optimized warheads are at least 80% more effective against aliens, and they also utilize the multi-angle damage feature of conventional Hellstorm rockets.
The multi-angle damage rocket for smart spenders. Your toughest enemies won't stand a chance against the many broadsides of the ECO Hellstorm.
The Hellstorm SAR-01, a Shield Leeching rocket, is fired from a rocket launcher. An especially good quick-strike weapon!
The Hellstorm SAR-02, a Shield Leeching rocket, is fired from a rocket launcher. An especially good quick-strike weapon!
The combo rocket will help you make a name for yourself. A combination of high damage infliction and Shield Leech is a one-two punch your enemies won't soon forget.
Cause extensive damage to aliens of max. 7,500 per shot! On other pilot's ships, they only cause a max. 4,000 damage per hit.
Absolutely bombastic - light up your enemies like the 4th of July with this special "birthday candle."
Low efficiency for a low price
More bang for your buck: x2 laser damage per round
This is the best standard laser ammo on the market. x3 laser damage per round
Available for limited time only! Radioactive Elite munition with 4x normal damage.
Special ammunition that reinforces your Shield, strengthening it by tapping into enemy shields (Shield Leech).
One type of ammo you just can't do without: Rain death on your enemies when you fire off a rapid laser salvo.
Combo 100 is a rare ammunition that inflicts the damage of the MCB-50 ammo along with half of the SAB-50 ammo's Shield Leech effect.
Multiplies Laser Damage x3 / Shield Leech x1
The Jack-O-Battery is a rare Halloween Ammo that causes 3.5 times the damage to NPCs and twice the damage to other players.
Multiplies Laser Damage x2 PVP / x3.5 PVE
This special-order ammo developed from rare Radiatium packs a wallop: 4 times stronger than conventional lasers when used on anything but Demaner hulls, against which it deals 8-fold damage!
4 times stronger than a conventional laser. 8 times the damage against Demaner freighters.
4 times stronger than conventional lasers, this ammunition also disperses virulent spores that infect other players.
4 times stronger than a conventional laser. Infects other players.
Deals 20% damage, doesn't affect your ship

If the Super Ice Meteoroid won't come to the pilot, then the pilot must go to the Meteoroid. Activate the Ice Portal on Battle Maps and on maps X3 through X8, and a Super Ice Meteoroid will appear soon thereafter. Ta-da!
The Cubi Portal works like a dog whistle. Activate the Cubi Portal on Battle Maps and on Maps X5 through X8, and a Cubikon will soon appear afterwards!
The Cubi Portal works like a dog whistle. Activate the Cubi Portal on Battle Maps and on Maps X5 through X8, and a Cubikon will soon appear afterwards!

Cosmetic P.E.T. designs as far as the radar's eye can see! Now the Arctic, Red, and Green P.E.T. designs can all be yours. Stand out from the crowd!

Fancy silhouettes, bright paint - M.A.S.Q.U.E. ensured that every pilot could find a design to suit them! Looking for something a little more colorful? With the Mirage, your P.E.T. will shine out like a deep-space beacon!
M.A.S.Q.U.E.'s P.E.T. designs were winners across the board. Grab the Chimera design in green, and bring a touch of natures bounty to space.
Thanks to M.A.S.Q.U.E., your P.E.T. can be an orange Chimera - ready to take on this world or any other. Bring a dab of color to the darkness of deep space!
Dragonfire! Friend and foe alike will be speechless before this Chimera design for your P.E.T. - look for the genuine article, now in dragon-red!

A shiny new offer from the mysterious M.A.S.Q.U.E.! Buy now, and you'll get the Mirage P.E.T. design and 10 Enigma designs for your drones, both in mighty, magnificent orange. Be the envy of friends and enemies alike!

Do you have a fiery temperament and the aesthetic to match? Then this fabulous offer from M.A.S.Q.U.E. is meant for you! Get the snazzy Chimera P.E.T. design along with 10 Phantom designs for your drones, both (of course) in flaming red!
A space ship enthusiast's delight! Fly off with a special design for your Aegis Elite, as well as 10 A-Elite drone designs and an A-Elite P.E.T. design, all painted in Poison!

Get the Poison A-Elite Drone Design now!

Pick your true colour of Spectrum from the much vaunted Spectrum Chroma Pack at a highly desirable price. Each pack contains the Poison, Sandstorm, Blaze and Ocean Spectrum designs.

Show humanity is unified in tribute to the brave men and women of the Prometheus, with the Promethean Honor Pack. Each pack contains a Champion Goliath and all flag designs at a remarkable discount price.

Send an icy chill down your enemies’ spine with the Frozen Mirage Pack. This chillingly valuable pack contains all the artic designs for the Spectrum, Sentinel, Venom, V-Lightning, Pusat and N-Ambassador.

In honor of our fallen heroes, and to support his family in their time of great loss, DarkOrbit is proud to announce the Fatsali Kerem Bundle. Containing the G-Champion Ship Design, Hezarfen Ship Design and 10 x Phantom Blaze Drone Designs. All proceeds donated to charity!

Bring the true force of the ocean forth with the Ocean Goliath-X Set and see what power truly exists beneath the waves! Each set contains the Ocean Goliath-X Ship Design, the Ocean Goliath-X P.E.T. Design and 10 Ocean Goliath-X Drone Designs. Time to see what power is really beneath the waves!

The Sandstorm Goliath-X Set is a true force of nature, the dusty yellow exterior formed from the precious sands of old Earth's deserts! Each set contains the Sandstorm Goliath-X Ship Design, the Sandstorm Goliath-X P.E.T. Design and 10 Sandstorm Goliath-X Drone Designs.

What could be better than getting a Borealis Goliath-X Set. A fresh take on the time-honoured design, with a frosty tint to warn your enemies about the cold of space! Each set contains the Borealis Goliath-X Ship Design, the Borealis Goliath-X P.E.T. Design and 10 Borealis Goliath-X Drone Designs.
A fabulous selection of designs available for all pilots of Venom, Solace and Aegis Elite vessels. Limited Offer!

With the improved specifications of the Havoc design, more energy can be redirected to the laser components. If all of the drones are equipped with the Havoc design, then all of the of the drones will profit from a laser cannon efficiency bonus of 10%.
Havoc Drone Design. Obtainable in Zeta Gate or various other locations.
The improved design lets you transfer more energy to the drone's shield generators. If all of your drones have the Hercules design, you'll receive an additional 20% increase in HP.
Hercules Drone Design. Obtainable in Kappa Gate and various other locations.

These gently glowing drones surround your ship like protective, deadly fireflies - and all for a good cause! By purchasing this, you too have become a Beacon of Hope to the many refugees around the world. Thank you!

Clothes make the man (naked pilots have little or no influence on society), and the same goes for drones. Equip yours with chilling Ice Meteoroid technology now, and trail lines of fabulous frost throughout deep space!

As long as you have 4 or more drones, you can use this formation any time after you've purchased it.

This is a stats drone design that modifies a drone's abilities.
You are already using this drone formation.
Be part of the excitement when your drones sport this design!
Devised with a venomous sting in its tail this Poison drone design was originally created for the Pusat but brings a sting to any ship you choose.
The dust of Mars is said to have been entwined into this Sandstorm drone design, formerly created for the Pusat but now available to all combat ships.
Set your world on fire, with this classic Lava drone design, initially configured for the Pusat but now a burning desire for any ship captain.
Bring the toxicity out with this iconic Poison drone design, which used to be for the Spectrum. Now all captains can have this venomous form, terrorising their opponents.
This Sandstorm drone design is said to have been formed from the dust of planets decimated by the Spectrum. What better style to give your ships drone, in memory of all those victories.
Burn through the space lanes with this Lava drone design that burns in the firmament. Whilst originally it was only Spectrum pilots who could enjoy this design it’s now available to all.
It's said that the radiance of this drone design comes from the specially-added Devolarium hair, but it could just be marketing hogwash!
Grab your sunglasses, and slap on the high protection sunblock, because this sunny drone design will get right under your skin!
With this design applied, your drones will roll through space like a hot stream of lava, and even melt any icy comets in her way!
The Ocean design for your drones combines both the terror and beauty of the deep sea like nothing else can!
Are you looking for a beautiful sight? With this design, your drones will turn into stunning sparks against the dark backdrop of space.
Flaming energies coat this seminal Blaze drone design, leaving a trail of fire across the universe. When it was originally devised it was for the Spectrum but now it’s available to all.
Be a beacon in the darkness with this classic Blaze drone design, bringing fire into everyone’s lives. Once only for the Pusat, it is now available for all hot-headed pilots.
Like the seas of Old Earth this classic Ocean drone design appears soothing and tranquil but hides the power beneath the waves. Originally designed for the Spectrum but now available to all.
When they created the Ocean drone designs they stirred the mystery of the seven seas into the mix. This iconic design was created for the Pusat but is now available for all ships.
Don't just have the appearance of a phantom, add the ghostly glow too. The Argon Phantom Drone Design makes it feel like the spirits are truly on your side.
Ensure they see your drone coming, the fire burning at its heart, with this Lava Phantom Drone Design. It's a new star in the heavens!
The Legend Phantom Drone Design is simply the best your drone can wear. The golden hues, reflecting the power and status you control by owning this design.
The Ocean Phantom Drone Design brings the deep blue hues of the ocean to your drone. A cool and refreshing hue to distract your enemies.
Impress your enemies with this Poison Phantom Drone Design. Your drone has never looked so good... or venemous!
Bring a fresh feel to your drone, with the awesome Borealis Goliath-X Drone Design.
Bring an ocean surge to your drone, with the enigmatic Ocean Goliath-X Drone Design.
The Goliath-X Drone Design gives your drone the stylish look of the G-X Class. The cutting edge of style!
Bring the dust devil to your drone, with this fabulous Sandstorm Goliath-X Drone Design.
The Inferno Drone Design brings a flavor of the fires of a red sun to surround your vessel. Give your enemies some burning love!
These Hammerclaw Drone Designs are part of the new Heavy Steel series, a perfect support for the Hammerclaw and designed to kick-ass!
The Cyborg Drone Designs are engineered from the fundamental design ethics of the Goliath, adding a significant support for all Cyborg pilots when they're in battle!
Theses Enigma Drone Designs are built to aid the first Hawk Stealth Fighters to come off the production line. As sleek and cunning as the ship they're designed for. A great addition for any pilot.

Lasers and rockets have a tough time with the Spartan drone design! Each Spartan drone increases damage and HP by 1%. If all of your drones have the Spartan design equipped, you’ll receive an additional 10% in shield power and 5% in HP.
When you apply the Argon Cyborg Drone Design to your drone you'll really stand out in the universe. But we all know that bright colours mean danger, and danger is you!
The Argon Hammerclaw Drone Design is a must have for any Hammerclaw fans. Simply equip on your drone and see how the sparkling light engulfs your enemies.
Engage in a light show of epic proportions as you dazzle your enemy with the Argon Enigma Drone Design. When equipped your drone will startle your enemies.
The power of the ocean surrounds your drone when you apply this Ocean Enigma Drone Design. Make them fear the power of the sea or attack them like a tsunami!
Give your drone a venomous taste when you equip this Poison Enigma Drone Design. Making some pilots think twice before targetting you, as they know you'll bite!
When you want to show them the lights of the big city, you want to show them the Argob G-Champion Drone Design. Dazzle them!
Be the master of fire and bring the Lava G-Champion Drone Design into battle with you. A hunk of burnin' love!
Live the legend and be the puilot the galaxy has called for. Equip this Legen G-Champion Drone Design to add extra gravitas.
The Silver G-Champion Drone Design is what the true classy pilot picks to fly with into battle. Make them rue the day they left spacedock!
With a Lava Cyborg Drone Design you have a fire with you as you swoop into combat. Make them wonder what hit them!
See the fire reflected in their eyes before they die in the depths of space when you equip this Lava Hammerclaw Drone Design. A must for any pilot
Bring your burning hot drones to the fight when you equip the Lava Enigma Drone Design. Let your enemies feel the real heat from those embers.
When you live in an Enigma you want everything to be legendary. Why not start by equipping the Legend Enigma Drone Design and show the enemies who's boss.
With the Lava Sentinel Drone Design you can show your fiery passion for battle. Simply apply this design to your drone and the warnign color will deter your enemies!
What better way to celebrate victory over alien species than coating your drone in the Argon colors. Each one representing a glorious victory and showing you mean business.
Bring a Legend to the fight when you equip this Legend Sentinel Drone Design to your ship. Making sure your opponents know the pilot behind those drones is a Legend too!
Make them notice you as you gleam in the depths of space. The Argon Diminisher Drone helps you stand out and be noticed, before you blow your enemies away!
Reveal the unstoppable power of Lava, when you equip your drone with the Lava Diminisher Drone Design. Make them hot under the collar when you face them in battle.
What a legend you are. Especially when you equip the Legend Diminisher Drone Design and give them a taste of your golden personality, before leaving them to suck vacuum!
You can't go wrong with a classic, and the Argon Goliath-X Drone Design simply makes those classic lines stand out for all to see. Dazzle and destroy. Now there's a policy!
When your drone looks like its been spewed forth from a volcano it means your enemies will be wary. Aplly the Lava Goliath-X Drone Design and give the familiar a new fiery tone.
When you mix a Legend with a classic you get the bright sparkle of the Legend Goliath-X Drone Design. Stand out in the crowd and then blast your enemies into dust!

The P.E.T. 10 is designed to accompany your ship and assist when it can. You can upgrade it with gear and AI protocols to enhance its effectiveness. It also collects experience and can level-up, becoming a powerful companion.
The cult of cool! This frosty design makes your faithful P.E.T. so chill, its style will be competition for Kristallon.
This design will imbue your P.E.T. with a high-tech look full of positive energy and joie de vivre!
The outer shell of your P.E.T. will look like it's bathed in spooky red St. Elmo's Fire, astonishing allies and aliens alike!
M.A.S.Q.U.E.'s P.E.T. designs were winners across the board. Grab the Chimera design in borealis, practically before this paint job becomes rarer!
Thanks to M.A.S.Q.U.E., your P.E.T. can be a Sandstorm Chimera - ready to take on this world or any other. Bring a dab of color to the darkness of deep space!
Dragonfire! Friend and foe alike will be speechless before this Chimera design for your P.E.T. - look for the genuine article, now in Blaze!

M.A.S.Q.U.E. was the last word in technology and style until their destruction. Celebrate them with this Mirage design for your P.E.T. This borealis version will bring a little life to the cold depths of space!

Fancy silhouettes, bright paint - M.A.S.Q.U.E. ensured that every pilot could find a design to suit them! Looking for something a little more colorful? With the Mirage, your P.E.T. will shine out like a deep-space beacon!
M.A.S.Q.U.E. put up a princely prize when they were sponsors of the UBA: a fiery Blaze Mirage design for your P.E.T.! An exclusive, only for the best of the best!

When your P.E.T. or ship is close to being destroyed, the Kamikaze Detonator will start the self-destruct sequence and explode, thereby taking out all enemies in the immediate vicinity.
When activated, the P.E.T. will be destroyed and will need to be repaired thereafter.
Repairs your ship during flight. Uses extra fuel for each repair.

Be a beacon in the darkness with this classic Blaze P.E.T. design, bringing fire into everyone’s lives. Once only for the Pusat, it is now available for all hot-headed pilots.
Like the seas of Old Earth this classic Ocean P.E.T. design appears soothing and tranquil but hides the power beneath the waves. Originally designed for the Spectrum but now available to all.
When they created the Ocean P.E.T. designs they stirred the mystery of the seven seas into the mix. This iconic design was created for the Pusat but is now available for all ships.
Give your P.E.T. the bling it was craving when you apply the Argon Chimera P.E.T. Design. Neon never looked so good.
The Lava Chimera P.E.T. Design is one of a kind. Where else can you find the lines of the Chimera with the true deep fires that burn at the heart of stars?
Give your P.E.T. the Midas touch with the Legend Chimera P.E.T. Design. It simply glistens like a newborn star and shimmers like the sun on the water.
Give your P.E.T. the true mystery of the deep with this Ocean Chimera P.E.T. Design.
The Poison Chimera P.E.T. Design is colored like a venemous poison. Give the enemy the idea you're not to be trifled with.
Bring a fresh feel to your P.E.T., with the awesome Borealis Goliath-X P.E.T. Design.
Bring an ocean surge to your P.E.T., with the enigmatic Ocean Goliath-X P.E.T. Design.
The Goliath-X P.E.T. Design gives your P.E.T. the stylish look of the G-X Class. The cutting edge of style!
Bring the dust devil to your P.E.T., with this fabulous Sandstorm Goliath-X P.E.T. Design.
Relight your fire with the Inferno P.E.T. Design. A flaming good appearance for your P.E.T. to warn your enemies that you're on fire!
This Inferno P.E.T. Design can be found in the Red and Blue Bounty Boxes.
Bring the hammer down on your enemies with the Hammerclaw P.E.T. Design. You'll be ready to bash and smash your enemies apart when you have this Heavy Steel addition!
This Hammerclaw P.E.T. Design can be found in the Red and Blue Bounty Boxes.
Engage your enemies with the Cyborg P.E.T. Design and watch they shake with fear as you arrive at the battle with this ally at your side.
This Cyborg P.E.T. Design can be found in the Red and Blue Bounty Boxes.
Make your P.E.T. glow like a neon sign in the inky darkness of space with the Argon Mirage P.E.T. Design. Clearly showing you fear no-one and are ready for business.
This Mirage P.E.T. Design can be found in the Red and Blue Booty Boxes.
The Argon Cyborg P.E.T. Design will enhance your appearance as you fly into battle. Often a distraction with its neon colors, this P.E.T. is there to keep you safe against the starry backdrop.
This Cyborg P.E.T. Design can be found in the Red and Blue Booty Boxes.
It's Hammertime! Give your Hammerclaw P.E.T. a mean streak with another of the Heavy Steel series, the Argon Hammerclaw P.E.T. Design. Show no mercy as you enter the fray.
This Hammerclaw P.E.T. Design can be found in the Red and Blue Booty Boxes.
Bring the taste of victory to the battlefield when you're accompanied by the Legendary Mirage P.E.T. Design. A taste of a bygone age of adventure and exploration.
This Mirage P.E.T. Design can be found in the Red and Blue Booty Boxes.
A venomous coat for your Poison Spectrum P.E.T. This design ensures your foes know that you're ready to strike!
The Poison Pusat P.E.T. Design gives your P.E.T. a toxic style. More than enough to ensure your enemies know how dangerous you are.
Give your P.E.T. a touch of class when you apply this Silver G-Champion P,.E.T. Design. Giving you a much-needed sparkle as you arrive in combat.
Be the hippest cat in the galaxy with the Argon G-Champion P.E.T. Design. Make them know you're ready for action when you battle with this design by your side.
Bring in the flames of desire when you kit you P.E.T with the Lava G-Champion P.E.T. Design. Something burns deep at your heart and it's the passion for battle!
The Legend G-Champion P.E.T. Design does everything it says on the tin. It makes your P.E.T. look like a legend. What more can we say.
Reinforces your P.E.T.'s hull and increases its HP
Make your P.E.T. stand out from the crowd with the Argon Sentinel P.E.T. Design. The colors scheme representing the many aliens Earth has defeated over the centuries.
Burst onto the battlefield with the fiery colours of the Lava Sentinel P.E.T. Design. Bring a lick of fire to proceedings as your enemies look-on in wonder!
Wear the colors of a true hero when you equip the Legend Sentinel P.E.T. Design. Proving your excellence in combat and providing a golden edge to proceedings.
When you want to diminishing the threat, what better way than skinning your P.E.T. with the Lava Diminisher P.E.T. Design. A hot way to say you mean business.
With neon styling across the surface the Argon Diminisher P.E.T. Design is a clear winner in classy skins. Apply yours now and suprrise your opponent with the grace and posture you show in battle.
This legend will never be diminished as the Legend Diminisher P.E.T. Design is second-to-none. Bringing a cool slice of civilisation to the vacuum of space, as you carve your way through the galaxy.
What a P.E.T. design. The Lava Goliath-X P.E.T. Design is the one that shows your fierce heart burning deep within the embers of the volcano. Release it when you enter battle by showing no remorse.
The Argon Goliath P.E.T. Design brings a fresh style to the classic P.E.T. What more could you want as you swoop into combat and let the enemy have it, with all guns blazing!

When the Legend Goliath-X P.E.T. came off the production line the workers had to wear sunglasses to subdue the shine. What ebtter way to tell the enemy you're coming, and to warn them you're a legend!

Nicknamed the 'egg' the Phoenix P.E.T. Design has been confirmed as a new rare classic throughout the human race. Whilst some may think it looks cute, it adds a certain something to the hardened space pilots appearance!
The cargo protocol expands your cargo bay by %amount%%.
The radar protocol extends the range of all P.E.T. gear with a radar. The range of all collector and locator gear will increase by %amount%%.
The salvage protocol increases rewards for bonus and cargo boxes, collected by your P.E.T. by %amount%%.
The shield protocol boosts your P.E.T.'s shield power by %amount%%.
The Laser Gun Protocol lets your P.E.T. cause %amount%% more laser damage.
The targeting protocol improves the accuracy of your P.E.T's lasers by %amount%%.
The evasion protocol makes it harder for your enemies to destroy your P.E.T. They'll have a %amount%% less chance of scoring a hit.
The HP protocol gives your P.E.T %amount%% more HP.
The alien protocol enables your P.E.T. to inflict %amount%% more damage to aliens.
With the fuel protocol, your P.E.T. will use %amount%% less fuel.
Sacrifice your P.E.T. to save a friend as some of its energy transfers to their shields!
Sacrifice P.E.T. to aid a friend.
This ability allows you to temporarily redirect nearby enemy fire towards your ship.
This skill fortifies your ship with protective armor and increases its resistance to damage; however, it will immobilize your ship.
This ability deploys a protective shield around your ship and redirects a portion of the damage inflicted on all nearby group members to your ship.
This ability briefly increases your ship's speed, so you can quickly travel long distances.
This skill cloaks you, removes you from the minimap and prevents you from being targeted by other players.
This ability emits an interference field which paralyzes enemy ships' functions. All effects which they are currently using will be compromised.

This skill doubles your recon range on the mini map.

This ability allows you to send new shield energy to a selected allied ship.
This ability makes your ship drop a repair pod to gradually repair all allied ships in the vicinity.

This ability allows you to mimic the appearance of the ship you've selected (human or alien). You name, P.E.T., and drones will be hidden, and aliens will ignore you. Entering combat will disable your hologram.

One of the Assembly's primary building blocks, scrap includes metals, alloys, plastics, nanotubes, and carbon fibrates.
Raw material for creating items in the Assembly. Saimon and Mordon value scrap highly, and often collect and carry it around.
A revolting, slightly phosphorescent, semi-organic material used in various Assembly processes, including safety padding.
Raw material for creating items in the Assembly. Refined from the processed carcasses of Sibelonit, Lordakia, and Lordakium.
Energy flash-petrified into a glowing solid by a process no human scientist has yet mastered, to their collective frustration.
Raw material for creating items in the Assembly. It powers Sibelon and Devolarium vessels, and can often be collected from their shattered hulls.
A data-conducting hypercrystal used in most modern communication and navigation components.
Raw material for creating items in the Assembly. Primarily obtained from Kristallon and Kristallin.
A shimmering substance with a high corrision resistance, used in its nanoparticle form to produce complex microelectronics in the Assembly.

Raw material for creating items in the Assembly. Pirates value Aurus highly and hoard it on a grand scale. It can be collected from the remains of Barracuda, Saboteur, Battleray, Annihilator and Interceptor.
Even the Kristallon have taken note of this small gadget's unique processing power. It's used to produce high-tech items in the Assembly.
Create it in the Assembly, or buy it in the shop.
This nano-based high-frequency cable is essential for signaling and measurement, and is used to produce high-tech items in the Assembly.
Create it in the Assembly, or buy it in the shop.
No micro-transistors, no modern microelectronics! These small units are everywhere, and are used to produce high-tech items in the Assembly.
Create it in the Assembly, or buy it in the shop.
It may not look like much, but this nano case will protect your sensitive electronics, no matter what. It's also used to produce high-tech items in the Assembly.
Create it in the Assembly, or buy it in the shop.
With its unmatched memory capacities, the nano condenser is a must for every space ship. It's used to produce high-tech items in the Assembly.
Create it in the Assembly, or buy it in the shop.
With this prismatic socket, slack joints and jamming are a thing of the past! It's also used to produce high-tech items in the Assembly.
Create it in the Assembly, or buy it in the shop.
Schism Crystals are formed from unstable particles when pilots eradicate all the enemies through the Delta, Kuiper and Kronos galaxy gates.
Schism Crystals are formed from unstable particles when pilots eradicate all the enemies through the Delta, Kuiper and Kronos galaxy gates.
Our scientists have discovered the formula for Duothrin, a more powerful exotic element. The more we learn about these new materials, the more we uncover!
You can obtain Duothrin by crafting the 20 Green Booty Key recipe.
Proxium appears to be a basis for all exotic elements. Created by the Stellar Quake of 2776. Our technicians are excited about its potential uses.
Proxium can be found in boxes, dropped by UFO and Ufonit within the Permafrost Fissure.
Quadrothrin is a highly unstable exotic element. Energy readings it gives off from its random pulses are fascinating. A useful building block, we're sure.
You can obtain Quadrothrin by crafting the 40K RSB-75 recipe.
The formula for Trittothrin is extremely valuable. An exotic element, with more power than Duothrin. We're excited to discover what it can be used for.
You can obtain Trittothrin by crafting the 500 Extra Energy recipe.
The Glacial Fragment is the crucial component needed to create a Subglacial CPU. The resonance of the fragment allows the CPU to calculate the trajectory through the Permafrost Fissure.
Craft Glacial Fragments in the Assembly or purchase them in the shop.

Bifenon is a rare element which occurred following the Permafrost Fissure and which gets deposited in some alien vessels engines and is also found in some booty boxes. It is fairly common, so make sure you search the remains of your enemies to see if any has been dropped.
Raw material for creating items in the Assembly. Bifenon can be found by killing various aliens and is also found in some booty boxes.

Kyhalon has now been discovered in galaxy gates and is also found in some booty boxes. It is extremely rare, the build up of the element into an actual gatherable resource taking a week. This is a fundamental element, which is vital in the crafting of the new LF4 lasers.
Raw material for creating items in the Assembly. Kyhalon can be gathered from the Weekly Missions and is also found in some booty boxes.

Tetrathrin is a man made element that was discovered following the impacts of a stellar quake on an experiment being conducted on Ganymede. The element is hard to develop but highly useful, a reward for pilots who aid humanity on a daily basis. It is also found in some booty boxes.
Raw material for creating items in the Assembly. Tetrathrin can be gathered from the Daily Quests and is also found in some booty boxes.

This viscous oil seems to be acting as a conduit between the infected alien and the power that is controlling it. The symbol on the cannister resonates with energy, warning humanity that a nightmare is just beginning.
Indoctrine Oil is a rare find on infected creatures, which are identified by the purple glow emanating from their surface.
This Hybrid Alloy is strange, as if affected by some strange unkown forces. It can be uses to create an Immunizer CPU which will alow you to enter the Quarantine Zone!
Hybrid Alloy drops from Blighted Gygerthralls, which only appear when Blighted Kristallon are destroyed.
